title: Summary of Isolette Thermostat Use and Exception Cases

rows.Title and Description: Normal Operation of Isolette Describes the normal operation of the Isolette by the Nurse
Configure the Isolette Describes how the Nurse configures the Isolette and Thermostat for the Infant
Maintain Desired Temperature Describes how the Thermostat turns the Heat Source on and off to maintain the Current Temperature in the Isolette within the Desired Temperature Range A-2
